name: Hell-Icopter (Jarpletz)
description:
Oh no! Your helicopter just fell down a sinkhole into Hell! (Relatable, right?!) In your desperate attempt to escape, avoid the perils of hell such as demons, falling rocks, lavafalls, and more as you rise above the relentless rise of the lava river. 

Hell-Icopter is a 2D arcade-style endless game made by Two Developers for ZenoJam 6. Try and get the highest score possible as you traverse your desperate journey through Hell, and, most importantly, Good Luck: You're going to need it!

Controls:

W-A-S-D to move.

Left-Click to shoot a Flare in the direction of the mouse.

Flares will destroy Demons, Bats, Stalactites, and Boulders

Have fun, and thanks for playing! Have a good flight!
